FAQ.title: Have questions?
FAQ.description: Everything you need to know about our AI automation services.

item1.question: How quickly can we get started?
item1.answer: We typically launch your first AI agent within 48-72 hours after the initial onboarding call. Our team handles the entire setup, training, and integration process so you can focus on results.

item2.question: Do you offer custom integrations?
item2.answer: Yes, Teqvention integrates with most major CRM, ERP, and support platforms including Salesforce, HubSpot, Zendesk, and custom APIs. We ensure seamless data flow across your stack.

item3.question: Is my data secure?
item3.answer: Absolutely. We are SOC2 compliant and use enterprise-grade encryption for all data processing. Your customer data is isolated and never used to train public models without your permission.

item4.question: Do you provide ongoing maintenance?
item4.answer: Yes, all our plans include ongoing maintenance, monitoring, and regular updates. We continuously refine the AI models based on performance data to ensure optimal results.

Footer.description: We support medium-sized companies in the structured digitalization of their processes – strategically, technically and sustainably.
